mapper.select: SELECT u.id as memberId,email,username,u.image_url as userImage, CASE WHEN g_u.clock_time > #{startTime} and g_u.clock_time < #{endtime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as clockStatus, CASE WHEN u.id = g.leader_id THEN 2 WHEN u.id = g_m.manager_id THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as post FROM group_user g_u LEFT JOIN user u ON g_u.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN group g ON g_u.group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN group_manager g_m ON g.id = g_m.group_id WHERE g_u.group_id = #{groupId}
